definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
men, women, young and old/all kinds of people/people of all ages
men and women should not touch hands when they give or receive things (citation, from Mencius)
pinyin: nan2 nu:3 shou4 shou4 bu4 qin1
luan4 gao3 nan2 nu:3 guan1 xi4

definition: a couple engaged in an illicit love affair/a cheating couple
see 男女同校[nan2 nu:3 tong2 xiao4]

sentences.english: Its mild, not cold but not dry, young and old Safe.
sentences.chinese: 它的品性温和，不凉不燥，男女老幼皆宜。

sentences.english: Dr Sivak said this might be due to height difference between the sexes.
sentences.chinese: 西瓦克博士说，这可能是由男女身高的差异造成的。

sentences.english: Looking at the higher and lower ends of the distribution, Hyde and her colleagues again found no meaningful differences between the genders.
sentences.chinese: 而在高分端和低分端，男女的分布也几乎一样。

sentences.english: Dr. Yehuda notes another difference between the sexes.
sentences.chinese: 亚霍达医生注意到男女间的另一个不同点。
昨晚我们参加两对男女的约会。

sentences.english: As for Saul, he made havock of the church, entering into every house, and haling men and women committed them to prison.
sentences.chinese: 扫罗却残害教会，进各人的家，拉着男女下在监里。

sentences.english: Coeducation gives kids the opportunity of growing in an atmosphere of diversity.
sentences.chinese: 男女同校为孩子提供了一种丰富多彩的成长环境。

sentences.english: Do men and women eat differently for comfort?
sentences.chinese: 在吃的方面，男女有没有不同的趋好？

sentences.english: In the spirit of gender-equality, a male-only carriage must be introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本着男女平等的精神，必须设立男士专用车厢。

sentences.english: That’s more than three times as fast as sales of men’s and women’s luxury outerwear in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 这比2010年男女奢侈品牌外套销售的三倍还多。

sentences.english: On the mantel were photographs of a man and a woman.
sentences.chinese: 壁炉架上面是一对男女的一些照片。

sentences.english: It's also a popular traditional game among local Kazaks.
sentences.chinese: 也是哈萨克男女特别喜欢的一种传统游戏。

sentences.english: Young men and women must quench their desire to marry early in life.
sentences.chinese: 青年男女一定要克制早婚的欲望。

sentences.english: All the people,men and women,old and young have plunged into war in the wartime.
sentences.chinese: 战时所有男女老少都投入到战争中去。

sentences.english: The guys and gals holding poses often have dramatic looks and body types.
sentences.chinese: 男女模特常常有惊艳的外表和身材。

definition: male and female/both types (acid and alkaline, positive and negative etc)/(chemistry) amphoteric
the bride's side (of a wedding)/of the bride's party
